title: Managing Your Income Effectively
description: This chapter teaches strategies for managing income through budgeting, saving, and making informed spending decisions.
learning_objectives: Create a personal budget based on income and expenses
Implement strategies to track spending and reduce expenses
Evaluate needs versus wants in spending decisions
Apply technology tools for effective income management

skill_builder.title: Budget Building Tool
skill_builder.description: An interactive budgeting tool that helps students allocate their income across different categories of spending and saving.
